subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: James Blake and Fabrice Santoro waged a battle worthy of their contrasting styles, pouring energy into every hard-fought point in Blake’s 6-4, 3-6, 6-2,4-6, 6-4 victory.
snippet: James Blake and Fabrice Santoro waged a battle worthy of their contrasting styles, pouring energy into every hard-fought point in Blake’s 6-4, 3-6, 6-2,4-6, 6-4 victory.
